languages.text: "Почему ты извиняешься? Впервые за весь разговор ты сделал что-то, что действительно хотел".

traits.locale_text: "Почему ты извиняешься? Ты выглядел счастливым. Впервые за весь разговор".

languages.text: "Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."
languages.original_text: "Почему ты извиняешься? Впервые за весь разговор ты сделал что-то, что действительно хотел".

traits.locale_text: "Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."
"Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."
"Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."
"Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."

languages.text: “你有什么好道歉的呢？在咱们这场谈话之中，这还是你第一次做了你真正想做的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."

traits.locale_text: “你有什么好道歉的呢？在咱们这场谈话之中，这还是你第一次做了你真正想做的事情。”

languages.text: «¿Por qué se disculpa? Por primera vez en toda esta conversación, ha hecho algo porque quería hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué se disculpa? Por primera vez en toda esta conversación, ha hecho algo porque quería hacerlo».

languages.text: 「なぜ謝るんだ？この会話で初めて、お前は本当にやりたいことをできたんじゃないか？」
languages.original_text: "Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ謝るんだ？この会話で初めて、お前は本当にやりたいことをできたんじゃないか？」

languages.text: « Pourquoi vous excusez-vous ? Pour la première fois depuis le début de cette entrevue, vous avez fait quelque chose qui vous faisait vraiment envie. »
languages.original_text: "Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi vous excusez-vous ? Pour la première fois depuis le début de cette entrevue, vous avez fait quelque chose qui vous faisait vraiment envie. »

languages.text: "Warum entschuldigt Ihr Euch? Zum ersten Mal während unseres Gesprächs habt Ihr etwas getan, was Ihr auch wirklich tun wolltet."
languages.original_text: "Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."

traits.locale_text: "Warum entschuldigt Ihr Euch? Zum ersten Mal während unseres Gesprächs habt Ihr etwas getan, was Ihr auch wirklich tun wolltet."

languages.text: "Neden özür diliyorsun? Sohbetimizin başından beri ilk defa gerçekten istediğin bir şey yaptın."
languages.original_text: "Why are you apologising? For the first time in this entire conversation, you did something you actually wanted to do."
